resources.string: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and basil leaves drizzled with balsamic glaze and extra virgin olive oil.
Creamy blend of spinach, artichokes, and Parmesan cheese served with warm tortilla chips.
Tender calamari rings lightly battered and fried to perfection, served with a zesty marinara dipping sauce.
Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, topped with lemon-dill sauce, and served with steamed asparagus and garlic mashed potatoes.
Juicy, tender filet mignon steak cooked to your liking, served with a red wine reduction sauce, roasted Brussels sprouts, and truffle mashed potatoes.
Saut√©ed seasonal vegetables and tofu or your choice of protein, tossed in a savory stir-fry sauce and served over jasmine rice.
Warm, molten chocolate cake with a gooey center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and drizzled with raspberry coulis.
Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese, dusted with cocoa powder.
Refreshing key lime pie with a graham cracker crust, topped with whipped cream and lime zest.
